Package com.ammrat13.javagame

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.ammrat13.javagame.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameManager
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class will manage all aspects of the game, including scene cordination. It will start on a given scene, and transition between them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • active

        private GameScene active
        The pointer to the active scene.

      • BG_SOUND

        private static final java.lang.String BG_SOUND
        The filename of the background music. This music is constant between scenes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • gss

        private final java.util.Set<GameScene> gss
        The set of all game scenes.

      • HEIGHT

        public final int HEIGHT
        The height of the canvas.

      • keysDown

        private final java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> keysDown
        The set of keys that are pressed down. Passed to scenes.

      • time

        private long time
        The current system time. Used to pass change in time to scenes.

      • WIDTH

        public final int WIDTH
        The width of the canvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager​(int width,
                   int height)
        Constructs the game manager. Sets the width, height, and current time, and initializes all the fields. Also starts the sound and sets the update() method to call every frame.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the game
        height - The height of the game
